title.narrative: Dialogue meeting on Inequality 9 September 2014 in Egitveds Pakhus

description.narrative: Danida approved an amount of DKK 15.000 from the "Seminar and Conference Account" to fund a seminar on inequality on 9 September 2014. The purpose of the seminar was to achieve an improved understanding of the significance of inequality in development, as well as to exchange experience on how to address different forms of inequality through the development programmes. Participants would be invited from NGOs, relevant research institutions and consultancy companies apart from internal staff members of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. A total number of 80 participants were expected. The main themes of the seminar would be economic inequality, social inequality, human rights and political inequality, as well as land issues, climate change and inequality.
